my_ml package

Submodules

my_ml.ingest_data module

my_ml.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(git_url, data_path)

This module is to download the data file from the given git hub url

Args:

git_url (str): This is the url from which data file can be downloaded data_path (str): This is the path to store the downloaded data file

Returns:

Boolean

my_ml.ingest_data.get_train_val_test_data(data_path, split_data_path)

This module splits the given dataframe into train and test data set

Args:

data_path (str): The path that contains source csv file split_data_path (str): The path where the splitted csv data has to be stored

Returns:

Boolean

my_ml.ingest_data.load_housing_data(data_path)

This module is to load the csv data to a dataframe

Args:

data_path (str): The path containing the csv file

Returns:

Dataframe of csv data

my_ml.logger module

my_ml.logger.log_initialize(filename)

This module is to initialize logger configuration with log path, level and format

Args:

filename (str): The filename with/without path to save the generated log in a file

Returns:

None

my_ml.score module

my_ml.score.final_predict(config)

This module is to get the score of Final model (best estimator) with validation data set

Args:

config (dictionary): A dictonary containing keys ml_model_path (pickle file path) & split_data_path (path containing test data set)

Returns (dictionary):

result: Boolean score: {“final_rmse”: final_rmse}

my_ml.score.get_score_LR(config)

This module is to get the score of Linear regression model with validation data set

Args:

config (dictionary): A dictonary containing keys ml_model_path (pickle file path) & split_data_path (path containing test data set)

Returns (dictionary):

result: Boolean score: {“lin_mae”: lin_mae, “lin_rmse”: lin_rmse}

my_ml.score.get_score_tree(config)

This module is to get the score of Decision Tree Regressor model with validation data set

Args:

config (dictionary): A dictonary containing keys ml_model_path (pickle file path) & split_data_path (path containing test data set)

Returns (dictionary):

result: Boolean score: {“tree_rmse”: tree_rmse}

my_ml.train module

my_ml.train.housing_model_build(config)

This module has pre processing and EDA algorithm

Args:

config: A dictionary with split_data_path (splitted data path) and ml_model_path (path to save model)

Returns:

Boolean

my_ml.train.housing_pre_process_eda(config)

This module has pre processing and EDA algorithm

Args:

config: A dictionary with split_data_path (splitted data path)

Returns:

Boolean

my_ml.train.income_cat_proportions(data)

This module will add a column “income_cat” for the input dataframe

Args:

Dataframe

Returns:

Dataframe with added income_cat column
